products.product_description:

Title: F11-2 Dual Wireless Microphone For iPhone

Model: F11-2

Code: 10241604

Category: Microphone / Wireless Mic / RamBD

Product Type: Microphone

Price: 999

Warranty: 0

Availability: Available/In Stock

Description:

The FT-MIC-F11-2 Wireless Microphone is a modern, high-performance wireless microphone designed for clear, professional-quality audio recording. With wide device compatibility, strong noise performance, and omnidirectional pickup, this microphone is ideal for content creators, vloggers, interviewers, teachers, and professionals. 🔹 Step 1: High-Quality Audio Performance This microphone features a wide frequency range of 25Hz – 25kHz, allowing it to capture deep bass tones as well as crisp high-frequency details. As a result, voices sound more natural, rich, and clear compared to standard built-in microphones. 🔹 Step 2: Strong Signal-to-Noise Ratio With a signal-to-noise ratio of ≥75dB to 85dB, the FT-MIC-F11-2 effectively minimizes background noise and interference. This ensures clean and professional audio output, even in busy or outdoor environments. 🔹 Step 3: Omnidirectional Polar Pattern The omnidirectional pickup pattern captures sound from all directions equally. This makes the microphone perfect for: Interviews Group conversations Vlogging while moving Online classes and presentations You don’t need to worry about mic positioning — your voice stays clear and consistent. 🔹 Step 4: Wireless Convenience Thanks to its wireless connectivity, you can record audio without dealing with messy cables. This provides complete freedom of movement, making it ideal for dynamic video recording, live sessions, and outdoor shooting. 🔹 Step 5: Wide Device Compatibility The FT-MIC-F11-2 supports multiple devices, making it extremely versatile: Type-C smartphones Lightning iPhones Cameras with 3.5mm audio port This wide compatibility allows you to use one microphone across different devices without extra hassle. 🔹 Step 6: Easy Plug-and-Play Setup No complicated installation or software is required. Just connect the receiver to your device, power on the microphone, and start recording instantly. This plug-and-play design is perfect for both beginners and professionals. 🔹 Step 7: Ideal Use Cases The FT-MIC-F11-2 Wireless Microphone is perfect for: YouTube & Facebook content creation Vlogging & Reels Interviews & field recording Online teaching & meetings Live streaming & presentations 🔹 Final Summary The FT-MIC-F11-2 Wireless Microphone combines high-quality audio performance, wide frequency response, strong noise control, omnidirectional pickup, and wireless freedom in one compact system. With support for Type-C, Lightning iPhones, and 3.5mm camera ports, it is a reliable and versatile audio solution for modern content creators and professionals.

Description:

🔹 Ulanzi WM10 Wireless Microphone — Professional Audio, Anywhere You Go Take your audio recording to the next level with the Ulanzi WM10 Wireless Microphone, a compact, lightweight, and portable solution designed for content creators, vloggers, live streamers, online educators, and professionals on the move. This microphone combines advanced technology with ease of use, ensuring crisp, clear, and professional-quality sound in any environment. 🎤 Microphone Features The WM10 is equipped with an omnidirectional condenser mic that captures sound from all directions. Featuring an advanced DSP noise reduction chip, it eliminates background noise for ultra-clear audio recordings. Its high sensitivity ensures your voice is picked up accurately, while the ultra-low latency (~15ms) provides real-time, lag-free sound — perfect for live streaming and video recording. For compatible devices, real-time monitoring is supported, so you can hear exactly what’s being recorded. 📡 Wireless Performance With 2.4 GHz digital transmission technology, the Ulanzi WM10 delivers stable and reliable wireless connectivity up to 20–30 meters (65–100 feet). The plug & play auto-pairing feature makes setup simple — just connect, and you’re ready to record. Anti-interference technology ensures your recordings remain stable even in wireless-heavy environments. 🔋 Battery & Charging Each WM10 microphone comes with a built-in 120 mAh battery that provides 6–7 hours of continuous usage on a single charge. The USB Type-C charging port allows for fast charging in 1–2 hours, and the mic supports charge while using, ensuring uninterrupted recording during long shoots or streaming sessions. 🔌 Compatibility The Ulanzi WM10 is designed to work seamlessly with a wide range of devices: Android smartphones and tablets with Type-C ports Type-C laptops Some Type-C cameras This makes it a universal solution for creators who need professional audio quality on multiple devices without the hassle of complicated setups. ✨ Why Choose Ulanzi WM10? Compact and portable for on-the-go recording Professional-grade sound quality with noise reduction Ultra-low latency for real-time streaming Long battery life with fast USB Type-C charging Easy plug & play setup, no extra apps or software needed Works with a wide variety of Type-C devices Whether you’re vlogging, producing YouTube content, teaching online classes, conducting interviews, or live streaming, the Ulanzi WM10 Wireless Microphone ensures your audio is always clear, reliable, and professional. Some Type-C cameras.

Description:

Product Overview The K10 Wireless Lavalier Microphone is a compact, lightweight, and easy-to-use wireless microphone designed for modern content creators, vloggers, online teachers, journalists, and interviewers. This microphone is specially built to provide clear, stable, and professional-quality sound for everyday recording needs. Whether you are recording videos, conducting interviews, streaming live, or attending online meetings, the K10 wireless microphone delivers reliable performance at an affordable price. 🎤 Clear & Noise-Free Audio Quality The K10 Wireless Lavalier Microphone features advanced noise reduction technology that effectively minimizes background noise and focuses on your voice. This ensures clean, natural, and crisp audio even in noisy environments such as streets, classrooms, or busy rooms. The omnidirectional microphone captures sound from all directions, providing balanced and realistic audio output. 📡 Stable 2.4GHz Wireless Transmission Equipped with 2.4GHz wireless technology, the K10 microphone offers stable signal transmission with low latency and minimal interference. You can move freely while recording without worrying about signal drops. This makes it ideal for presentations, interviews, video shooting, and outdoor recordings. 🔌 Plug & Play Convenience The K10 Wireless Lavalier Microphone comes with a plug-and-play design, which means no apps, drivers, or Bluetooth pairing are required. Simply plug the receiver into your device, power on the microphone, and start recording instantly. This user-friendly setup saves time and makes the microphone suitable for beginners and professionals alike. 🎯 Wide Device Compatibility The K10 wireless microphone is compatible with a wide range of devices, including: Smartphones (Android & iPhone*) Tablets Laptops and PCs Cameras and recording devices This wide compatibility makes the K10 microphone perfect for YouTube videos, Facebook Live, TikTok content, podcasts, online classes, Zoom meetings, and voice recording. (*Adapter may be required for some iPhone models.) 🧲 Lightweight & Comfortable Design The compact clip-on design allows you to attach the microphone easily to your collar, shirt, or jacket. Its lightweight construction ensures comfortable use even during long recording sessions. You can carry it anywhere without adding extra weight. 🔋 Long-Lasting Battery Performance The K10 Wireless Lavalier Microphone is designed for extended usage, allowing you to record for several hours on a single charge. This makes it suitable for long interviews, online classes, and continuous video recording. 💰 Affordable & Reliable Choice If you are searching for a budget-friendly wireless microphone with reliable performance, clear sound, and easy operation, the K10 Wireless Lavalier Microphone is an excellent choice. It offers great value for money and meets the needs of beginners as well as regular content creators.

Description:

Elevate your content creation with the Jmary MW-17 2.4G Wireless Microphone – a compact, plug-and-play lavalier mic system designed specifically for Android smartphones, tablets, and USB-C devices. Say goodbye to tangled wires and poor audio quality! This affordable wireless mic delivers crystal-clear sound with built-in noise cancellation, making it perfect for vloggers, YouTubers, TikTok creators, podcasters, live streamers, interviewers, online teachers, and anyone who needs professional-grade audio on a budget. Featuring 2.4GHz digital wireless transmission, the Jmary MW-17 ensures stable, interference-free connection with ultra-low latency (≤20ms) – your voice syncs perfectly with video, no annoying delays! The omnidirectional pickup captures sound from all directions, while advanced DSP noise reduction filters out background noise like traffic, fans, or wind for cleaner recordings. The kit includes rechargeable transmitters with clip-on design (easy to attach to clothing), a Type-C receiver that plugs directly into your phone (no apps or drivers needed), and a portable charging case with LED battery display. Enjoy up to 6 hours of continuous use per mic, plus extended backup from the case for all-day shooting. Whether you're recording Reels in Dhaka streets, conducting interviews, teaching online classes, or streaming on Facebook/YouTube – the Jmary MW-17 makes high-quality audio effortless and mobile-friendly. Lightweight, portable, and reliable – it's the ideal upgrade from built-in phone mics at a fraction of the cost of premium brands. Key Highlights: Plug-and-play simplicity for instant setup Professional noise-cancelling for clear voice in any environment Long battery life with convenient charging case Compatible with most Android phones (USB-C/OTG support), laptops, and tablets Ideal for content creators in Bangladesh – budget-friendly & high performance.

Description:

Take your mobile recording to the next level with the Jmary MW-19 2.4G Dual Wireless Microphone – a versatile, plug-and-play lavalier mic system perfect for Android (Type-C) and iPhone (Lightning) users. No more dealing with messy cables or muffled audio! This compact wireless setup delivers professional-grade sound with intelligent noise cancellation, making it an essential tool for vloggers, YouTubers, TikTok/Reels creators, podcasters, live streamers, interviewers, online educators, and content creators in Bangladesh. Powered by stable 2.4GHz digital wireless transmission, the MW-19 offers ultra-low latency (≤20ms) for seamless lip-sync in videos. The omnidirectional microphones capture clear, natural voice from any angle, while advanced DSP noise reduction eliminates unwanted background sounds like street noise, wind, or AC hum – ideal for recording in busy Dhaka environments. The dual-transmitter design (2 mics + 1 receiver) supports simultaneous recording for interviews or duos, with magnetic clips for easy, secure attachment to clothing. The portable charging case keeps everything powered, featuring LED indicators for quick battery checks. Enjoy up to 6 hours of use per mic, with extended backup from the case for longer shoots. Setup is effortless – plug-and-play with no apps, Bluetooth pairing, or drivers required. Just connect the receiver (Type-C or Lightning version) to your device and start capturing high-quality audio instantly. Whether you're filming street vlogs, product reviews, online classes, Facebook Lives, or professional interviews, the Jmary MW-19 provides reliable, budget-friendly performance that rivals more expensive brands. Standout Features: Dual compatibility for Android & iPhone users Magnetic clip design for secure, stylish wear Pro noise cancellation for crystal-clear voice Long battery life with convenient charging case Ultra-low latency and stable 20m range.
